title: Wupatki National Monument: Kids & Youth
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     Kids & Youth             Kids & Youth       Our Junior Ranger Program How did people survive in the arid environment of Wupatki? Kids just like you lived in these ancient walls. How do you think they found water, kept rabbits from eating their gardens, and helped their families make clothes? Become a Junior Ranger to find out! WebRangers Become a WebRanger. Now you can have fun and learn about national parks even if you are not able to visit a park right now.
